com.swoval.files

Class Observers<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swoval.files.Observers<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The data type for the FileCache to which the observers correspond
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Directory.Observer<T>, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Observers<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Directory.Observer<T>, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Container class that wraps multiple Directory.Observer and runs the callbacks for each whenever the FileCache detects an event.

      • apply

        public static <T> Directory.Observer<T> apply(Directory.OnChange<T> onchange)
        Simple observer that fires the same callback for all regular events and ignores any errors.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The generic type of the Directory.Entry
        Parameters:
        onchange - The callback to fire when a file is created/updated/deleted
        Returns:
        An Directory.Observer instance
